CustomField.formula: "/apex/%nsp%OmniScriptUniversalPage?layout=lightning&id=" & Id & "&campaignId=" & CampaignId & "#/OmniScriptType/" & Campaign.vlocity_cmt__ProcessType__c & "/OmniScriptSubType/" & Campaign.vlocity_cmt__ProcessSubType__c & "/OmniScriptLang/" & Campaign.vlocity_cmt__ProcessLanguage__c & "/ContextId/"& Id & "/PrefillDataRaptorBundle/"+ Campaign.vlocity_cmt__ProcessPrefillBundle__c +"/false"
CustomField.label: Campaign OmniScript URL
